/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/YourExecutable.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/YourExecutable.dir/cuda_transform.cpp.o CMakeFiles/YourExecutable.dir/YourExecutable_generated_cuda_transform.cu.o  -o YourExecutable  /usr/local/cuda-11.4/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/librt.so /usr/local/cuda-11.4/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lpcl_common -lpcl_io -lpcl_filters
